data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Negros Occidental, Philippines to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Negros Occidental, Philippines
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 1,923,808 people in the state of Negros Occidental who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Negros Occidental, Philippines.
data.prayer: Father, make yourself real to these new families.
Lord, please give the 347,869 believers in the state of Negros Occidental the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, move the 347,869 believers in the state of Negros Occidental to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Negros Occidental.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Negros Occidental to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Negros Occidental, Philippines.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

location.name: Negros Occidental
location.cities_list: Bacolod City, Mansilingan, Bago City, Kabankalan, Cadiz
location.cities_list_w_pop: Bacolod City (454,898), Mansilingan (454,150), Bago City (191,210), Kabankalan (136,483), Cadiz (129,053)
